Methods in jpo that return PictureInfo
 PictureInfo PictureInfoChangeEvent.getPictureInfo()
          returns the PictureInfo object that created the event
 PictureInfo PictureInfo.getClone()
          Returns a new PictureInfo object which is identical to the current one.
 

Methods in jpo with parameters of type PictureInfo
